column11: If your amount is a string, there will be a GMS crash.
If your amount is 0 or <0, there will be a DQBE error screen.
The crash/error will happen when you select the object
If the illegal ammount is located in 1E the GMS crash will be instant.
Leaving the cell blank is also considered as a illegal value.
